topology: 所有的路由器都运行OSPF，并将整个自治系统划分为2个区域。在区域Area1中，DeviceA和DeviceB之间的链路是高速链路。Area2中DeviceA到DeviceB的流量是沿区域内DeviceA->DeviceC->DeviceD->DeviceB转发。
requirement: 配置OSPF多区域邻接，在DeviceA和DeviceB之间建立多区域接口，使该多区域接口属于Area2。这样，Area2中DeviceA到DeviceB的流量可以沿DeviceA->DeviceB这条高速链路转发。
steps: 使能多区域邻接接口的OSPF。

configs.DeviceA:
#
sysname DeviceA
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.1.1 255.255.255.0
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.1
 ospf enable multi-area 0.0.0.2
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.2.1 255.255.255.0
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.2
#
ospf 1
 area 0.0.0.1
 area 0.0.0.2
#
return
configs.DeviceB:
#
sysname DeviceB
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.1.2 255.255.255.0
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.1
 ospf enable multi-area 0.0.0.2
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.3.1 255.255.255.0
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.2
#
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 1.1.1.1 255.255.255.255
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.1
#
ospf 1
 area 0.0.0.1
 area 0.0.0.2
#
return
configs.DeviceC:
#
sysname DeviceC
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.4.1 255.255.255.0
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.2
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.2.2 255.255.255.0
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.2
#
ospf 1
 area 0.0.0.2
#
return
configs.DeviceD:
#
sysname DeviceD
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.4.2 255.255.255.0
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.2
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.3.2 255.255.255.0
 ospf enable 1 area 0.0.0.2
#
ospf 1
 area 0.0.0.2
#
return
